original_text: She had paid many doctors to help her to become well. But they could not do anything. Now she had spent all her money. She had not become well. Instead, she was now worse.
korean_text: 많은 의사에게 많은 괴로움을 받았고 가진 것도 다 허비하였으되 아무 효험이 없고 도리어 더 중하여졌던 차에

sentences.original_text: to help her to become well
But they could not do anything
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 아무것도 할 수 없었다

sentences.original_text: Now she had spent all her money
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 그녀는 모든 돈을 다 써버렸다
